Errors.email: Please enter a valid email address

Utils.choose_galerie: Choose an image from the gallery

Export.title: Are you sure you want to export the photos?
Export.text: The photos will be downloaded in a zip format to minimize space usage.

Delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

Logout.title: Are you sure you want to log out?

Home.need_auth: You need to authenticate or create an account
Home.set_event:
Welcome back! You have a major event planned for {{eventDate}}.
For now, you can access the application in preview mode.
Home.event_not_editable: Welcome back! I hope everything went well. You can no longer edit the application, but you can view and even download the photos if you wish!
Home.message_share_link: Hello, I'm sharing the link to my wedding application with you. This application will only be available on the day of my wedding, so I'm counting on you. Follow this link or enter the following code: {{code}}
Home.qr_code: Once scanned, this QR code will direct your guests to your application. We recommend printing it and placing it where everyone can see it during your wedding.
Home.create_event: Do you want to create an event?

Text.presentation: To be ready on the big day, I need some information. After providing this information, you will only have access to the application to complete it (enter seating arrangements and menu). The application will be available to your guests on the big day. In the meantime, you can modify this application as you see fit.
Text.explain_text_presentation: This message will be displayed on the application's home page. Additionally, during the application preview, you can modify this text and its size.
Text.explain_date: I need the exact date of your wedding, as the application will be available to your guests only on that date. You won't be able to modify it afterwards, so please be careful.

Edit_mode_dialog.title: Welcome to the preview
Edit_mode_dialog.presentation:
You are in the application preview. You can make any necessary modifications.

Your application will only be available to your guests on your wedding day:
Edit_mode_dialog.accueil_import_picture: Add a background photo to your application
Edit_mode_dialog.photo_explain: This is where your guests (and you) can post photos from the event
Edit_mode_dialog.parametre_explain: You can find essential information about your event here.
Edit_mode_dialog.parametre_export: This is where you can retrieve the photos your guests have posted.

Auth.auth_required: Please authenticate to access the photos

Condition_utilisation.title: Terms of Use
Condition_utilisation.explain: By checking this box, you accept the application's terms of use

Errors.patternDate: Must be in the format DD/MM/YYYY
Errors.superieur_date_jour: Must be greater than the current date
